input_email_body:
Subject: Incident of Data Leakage in Hospital IT Networks

Recently, there was an unauthorized access to patient medical records due to data leakage You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. The likely reasons are weak security measures and outdated software My name is David Kim.. Steps taken include updating antivirus software and conducting a network scan, but the issues still persist. Assistance is needed to resolve the issue and prevent future breaches.
